meanings.definition: A place where crepes are made and sold.
meanings.sent1: We visited the creperies in town to try their delicious crepes.
meanings.sent2: The creperies on the corner always have a long line of customers.
meanings.sent3: The creperies were so busy that the chef accidentally flipped a crepe onto the ceiling!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the creperies wafted through the air, enticing passersby to stop and indulge.
meanings.sent5: The colorful decorations of the creperies made it a cheerful place to enjoy a sweet treat.

meanings.definition: The business of making and selling crepes.
meanings.sent1: She decided to start her own creperies after perfecting her crepe recipe.
meanings.sent2: The creperies industry has been growing rapidly due to the popularity of crepes.
meanings.sent3: The competition between creperies was fierce, with each trying to attract more customers.
meanings.sent4: In the world of food businesses, creperies stand out for their unique offerings.
meanings.sent5: The success of her creperies was a result of her passion for creating delicious crepes.
